data.comment: Today's referee, Hajime Matsuo, has blown to start the match.
Hiroshima drive upfield and Leandro Pereira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
In the minute 3, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo waits before resuming play because Sergi Samper for Kobe is still down.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 5, Sergi Samper returns to the field for Kobe after picking up a slight injury.
Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hayao Kawabe of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 12, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Free kick Kobe.
Dyanfrez Douglas's header is off-target for Kobe.
Hajime Matsuo awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) has received a first yellow card.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Kobe.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 28, Yuta Goke is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Kobe.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kobe defender.
In the minute 32, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hiroshima's Yusuke Chajima goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 36, At EDION Stadium, Kobe are penalized for being offside.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe.
Shunki Higashi (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 38, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Kobe's area.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Sho Sasaki heads in to make it 1-0 at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 43, Tsukasa Morishima instrumental with a fine assist.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 45, Free kick Kobe.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Hiroshima.
Andres Iniesta (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Hiroshima take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Leandro Pereira.
Great play from Ezequiel to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at EDION Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 47, In Hiroshima, Ezequiel of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Leandro Pereira's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, Kobe have a goal kick.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 52, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 54, Andres Iniesta (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Play has been interrupted briefly in Hiroshima to check on Leandro Pereira, who is grimacing with pain.
Junya Tanaka is on a sub for Yuta Goke for Kobe.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 58, Leandro Pereira is back on his feet again.
Kobe push forward at EDION Stadium and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hiroshima defence.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 59, Kobe to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima drives forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal kick for Kobe at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 66, Yuya Asano is replacing Ezequiel for the home team.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's second substitution at EDION Stadium with Toshihiro Aoyama replacing Gakuto Notsuda.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Sergi Samper with Noriaki Fujimoto. This is the second substitution made today by Atsuhiro Miura.
In Hiroshima, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 70, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima attack through Yusuke Chajima. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 72, Kobe have a goal kick.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a third substitution, with Yoshifumi Kashiwa replacing Yusuke Chajima.
Kobe drive upfield and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
In the minute 75, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Hiroshima.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 77, Ryo Hatsuse is replacing Gotoku Sakai for Kobe at EDION Stadium.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
At EDION Stadium, Dankler has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Tsukasa Morishima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kobe throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Dankler puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 84, Kyogo Furuhashi with an assist there.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yuya Asano of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 87, Important block from the Kobe defence as Tsukasa Morishima fires in a strike for Hiroshima.
Ryo Hatsuse (Kobe) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Hiroshima advance rapidly upfield but Hajime Matsuo blows for offside.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira gets in a shot on goal at EDION Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hajime Matsuo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Hiroshima.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Kobe at EDION Stadium.
Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Hiroshima. The final score is 2-1.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Kodai Dohi replacing Tsukasa Morishima.
